author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Properly handle removal of properties.
Passes switch test #17 (refresh the WC file system read-only attribute).
(report_dir_t): Add in a hashtable to store removed props.
(push_state): Create remove prop hash when created a dir.
(set_baton_props): Take in an svn_string_t argument; handle the 'svn:'
(remove_file_props, remove_dir_props): Variant of set_file_props that passes
in NULL to set_baton_props to tell the editor to remove this property.
(close_dir, handle_fetch, handle_propchange_only): Remove any props that
we've been told to remove by walking the removed property hash.
(fetch_file): If we aren't going to fetch the file or its properties, chances
are that it's a remove-prop condition - call propchange driver immediately.
(start_report): Handle remove-prop for dirs and set-prop/remove-prop for
(end_report): If we're dealing with a remove-prop case, set a 0-len string
into the removed hash so we know to delete it later.
(link_path): No need to back-escape the forward slash.

author: dlr
msg: Doc string adjustments, mostly adding missing @since tags.
Add @since tags to new classes/members.  In JNIUtil.h, also adjust

author: dlr
msg: Add JavaHL wrapper for Subversion's svn_path_check_valid() API.
(SVNPath): New class declaration and definition.  Not currently
New JNI implementation for the org.tigris.subversion.javahl.Path
the C++ SVNPath::isValid() implementation as the Java
New class intended as an external API.  Loading it initializes the
native libraries in a static block (a la SVNClient and SVNAdmin).
(testPathValidation): New unit test for the Path.isValid() API.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Accept a 204 as a valid response to a COPY per RFC 2518 / 8.8.5.
Passes switch test #8 (relocate with deleted, missing and copied entries).

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Add / before linkpath so the server doesn't get confused and give us
Passes switch test #3 (update wc that contains switched things), #4 (reverse
update wc that contains switched things), #5 (update switched wc things to
HEAD), #6 (reverse update switched wc things to an older rev).
(link_path): Always add an / before our path.
